channel.description: adding shops to karmascape i can't correct the autospawn... i can add the shop, just not the correct autospawn wtf do i do so when i trade the guy it doesn't disconnect me [code]spawn = 549 3540 9891 0 3541 9892 3538 9890 1 NewNPC[/code]

the coords messed up or somtin cuz this guy worked

spawn = 557	3208	3426	0	2952	3208	2946	3202	1	Rimmington Crafting Shop

i changed the coords and he messed up[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 10:36:40 PM[/size][hr]yeah, tried again, i can add the shop, just not the coords for autospawn

i added a shop to an unoccupied npc i had, and it worked fine(the blank guy came with the server)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 06:10:28 PM[/size][hr]don’t be afraid you can help me

item.title: Hey, i bet if my grandma came here, she'd know this answer!
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

uhm here’s mine to the break

[code]case 17: //second Click npc
NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128);
NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
FishingGo = false;
PutNPCCoords = false;
if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495) { /Banking/
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
WanneBank = 2;
} else if (NPCID == 309 || NPCID == 316) { /Bait From Lure & Bait/
if (IsItemInBag(307) == true && IsItemInBag(313) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 2;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_rod1_lvl[0];
fishing[5] = 313;
fishing[6] = 307;
fishing[7] = 0x26E;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(307)+” and “+GetItemName(313)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 312) { /Harpoon From Cage & Harpoon/
if (IsItemInBag(311) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 6;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_harpoon_lvl[0];
fishing[6] = 311;
fishing[7] = 0x26A;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(311)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 313) { /Harpoon From Net & Harpoon/
if (IsItemInBag(311) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[1] = 76;
fishing[2] = 110;
fishing[4] = 383;
fishing[6] = 311;
fishing[7] = 0x26A;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(311)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 319) { /Bait From Net & Bait - Lumby Swamp/
if (IsItemInBag(307) == true && IsItemInBag(313) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 3;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_rod2_lvl[0];
fishing[5] = 313;
fishing[6] = 307;
fishing[7] = 0x26E;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(307)+” and “+GetItemName(313)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 300 || NPCID == 844 || NPCID == 462) { /Essence Mine Guys/
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3489;
if (NPCID == 300) {
Essence = 1;
} else if (NPCID == 844) {
Essence = 2;
} else if (NPCID == 462) {
Essence = 3;
}

			else if (NPCID == 540) { //MoparScape Ownage store.
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 17; //End of MoparScape Ownage store.
			}
			else if (NPCID == 522) { //MoparScape Ownage store.

item.title: Hey, i bet if my grandma came here, she'd know this answer!
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

This is how mines looks like replace ur case 17 all the way down to the break;
though i only have 13 shops on my server lol so you can add the rest.

[code] case 17: //second Click npc
NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128);
NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
faceNPC(NPCSlot);
FishingGo = false;
PutNPCCoords = false;
if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495 || NPCID == 2619 ) { /Banking/
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
WanneBank = 2;
} else if (NPCID == 309 || NPCID == 316) { /Bait From Lure & Bait/
if (IsItemInBag(307) == true && IsItemInBag(313) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 2;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_rod1_lvl[0];
fishing[5] = 313;
fishing[6] = 307;
fishing[7] = 0x26E;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(307)+” and “+GetItemName(313)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 312) { /Harpoon From Cage & Harpoon/
if (IsItemInBag(311) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 6;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_harpoon_lvl[0];
fishing[6] = 311;
fishing[7] = 0x26A;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(311)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 313) { /Harpoon From Net & Harpoon/
if (IsItemInBag(311) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[1] = 76;
fishing[2] = 110;
fishing[4] = 383;
fishing[6] = 311;
fishing[7] = 0x26A;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(311)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 319) { /Bait From Net & Bait - Lumby Swamp/
if (IsItemInBag(307) == true && IsItemInBag(313) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 3;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_rod2_lvl[0];
fishing[5] = 313;
fishing[6] = 307;
fishing[7] = 0x26E;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a “+GetItemName(307)+” and “+GetItemName(313)+” to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 300 || NPCID == 844 || NPCID == 462) { /Essence Mine Guys/
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3489;
if (NPCID == 300) {
Essence = 1;
} else if (NPCID == 844) {
Essence = 2;
} else if (NPCID == 462) {
Essence = 3;
}

				} else if (NPCID == 516) { 
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 1; 
				} else if (NPCID == 517) { 
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 2; 
				} else if (NPCID == 520) { 
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 3; 
				} else if (NPCID == 521) { 
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 4;

				WanneShop = 13; 

				
			} else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("teh x n00b")){
				println_debug("atNPC 2: "+NPCID);
			}
			if (FishingGo == true) {
				IsUsingSkill = true;
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				fishing[0] = 1;
			}
			if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
				skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
				skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
